title: Now that Jhin finally got a skin can Illaoi get one too?
body: Jhin is getting that amazing blood moon skin but Illaoi hasn't got a skin since she was released. And she was released earlier than Jhin. Kindred who was released before her also got a skin. So illaoi skin pls

replies.body:
No, Yorick has gotten a skin since his initial release.  

That being said yeah he needs a new skin.  Watch Riot give us an Effortless Yorick skin.  One of those 390 skin recolours that should be a chroma.  Just changes his cape to a dark blue or something.

Edit:  I am wrong, TY for the corrections people.

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V9HjORsP,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-01-25T05:10:32.933+0000)
>
> No, Yorick has gotten a skin since his initial release.  

Name the skin then.

Yorick - Released June 22, 2011
Undertaker - Released June 22, 2011
Pentakill - Released June 22, 2011

Unless there's a skin I'm missing, that's it.
I Think he forgot that champs used to have 2 release skins

Huh, could have sworn Pentakill was released at a later date.  Used to play quite a bit of Yorick and knew most of his trivia, feel bad that I messed up on that.  Must have gotten confused with a different skin since pentakill is a skin line.

Yup you are right though.  Geez, Yorick is even worse off than I thought lol.

Yorick has so much potential for skins too for his little henchman and maiden.

Why not a Santa Yorick with elves as ghouls and a Miss Santa Maiden?
Or maybe a some sort of warmonger with little spear men, and a witch.
yorick technically got 3 skins after the VGU. They had to redesign all of them

Yes she needs it. 

Also {{champion:83}}  sends his regards
{{champion:6}} too

> [{quoted}](name=She squats bro,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V9HjORsP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-25T03:46:56.772+0000)
>
> Yes she needs it. 
> 
> Also {{champion:83}}  sends his regards

yorick is one of my favourite champs and hasnt got a skin since his release so about 6 years now?
You are right. Almost 6 fking years

This is BS riot.  Illaoi was release next after kindred and jhin after her. She should be getting her first skin since launch since the previous oldest champ got one (galaxy kindred).  She was released November 2015 come on Riot.
It also depends on playrate, not just seniority.
*ahem*{{champion:103}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:157}}

Its not uncommon for a champion who was released at a later date,to get a skin before others.
I mean {{champion:157}} and {{champion:161}} both got their first skin before {{champion:222}}
{{champion:154}}
Gnar and ekko got a skin before later champions. Rek'sai as well. They will get a skin in time. Soon im sure this yr
I think Illaoi might have the Zyra syndrome; she doesn't get skin, because it's too many models to make :> Official Riot statement
Meanwhile Azir got 3 skins within slightly more than a year (yes, one is the SKT skin, but that still goes to show).

Uhhhh, i mean, the LCS one kinda doesn't go to show? LCS skins always go against the Skin-Timeline-schedule they have going on. If a SKT had a player known for his dank Illaoi plays in LCS, I'm sure Illaoi definitely would've been up in consideration.
:'))))))) At least Azir's my second so that's where they satisfy me pretty well. But c'mon, compare the pick rate of them!
Still waiting for an {{champion:136}}  and a {{champion:163}}  skin :3
{{champion:154}}

Zac got already his pool party skin.
Sure its not much given the fact that he came out in season 3,but at least he has 2 skins(+3 chromas)
{{champion:136}}
{{champion:154}}

{{champion:83}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:30}}  they have not gotten a skin from my knowledge in a longggggggg time
Karthus got one not too long ago.
i forgot he did. XD rip its pretty cool
{{champion:136}} is the one I want the most tbh. like c'mon, he's a fuckin' DRAGON. any skin you make for him is guaranteed to be DOPE.

i think {{champion:6}} needs a http://imgur.com/Nt8omve skin... 

but sure im in favor of all champs having more skins why not? whats the harm riot just makes more $$$ with it
Kled needs a new one too
Kled really hasn't been out that long though. There's a long list of people ahead of him that deserve one first. Although as a Kled main myself I wouldn't object to a new skin :^)
Well, and Kled's Release skin wasn't all that impressive
void bringer is pretty disgusting IMO
We need Dunkmaster {{champion:420}}

Cassio hasn't seen a skin in sooo long. A lot longer than Illaoi.

Casio has been nearly 4 years, Illaoi has only been like 1 year and 2 months.

I agree that she should get a skin, granted I don't play her at all. But some of the OG champs should get them before the newer champs sitting in the 1-2 year bracket.
Cass has skins already though, and Riot tends to use this new pattern for new champs, where they cycle through them in order for new skins.
The skins she has are pure dog poop. 2 were released very close to each other, and the last one was a few months after. Haven't seen one since.
I didn't say they were good :^)
for some reason I feel like Illaoi and maybe Zyra will be getting a new skin next month, with the skin being "Gate Keeper" and will be released with the Galio Rework
Waiting for that Dunkmaster Illaoi skin they promised us.
Dunk Master Illaoi needs to happen
Illaoi has less players and would be harder to get a concept to stick for her.

{{champion:69}} or {{champion:112}} haven't got a skin in a while, have they?

Neither has {{champion:68}} I believe.

Viktor got his latest skin in October of 2013 (3 total skins), Cass got one in February of 2013  (4 total skins and 3 chromas) and Rumble got one in April of 2014 but it was a Legendary (3 total skins).
Do you expect Riot to answer with "no, Illaoi can't have a new skin"?
She needs a pool party skin asap. At least Taric got a new skin.
What if she's getting the challenger skin
